entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add antiforgery (anti-csrf) support to minimal endpoints #38630
  • VS.Redist packages contain different .msi Package Codes than Bundles #38629
  • Service is not registered for AuthenticationStateProvider in AddBlazorWebView - WPF BlazorWebView #38628
  • Perf regression: mvc #38627
  • Perf improvement: json #38626
  • net6.0: Runtime error: invokeJSFromDotNet creating HostBuilder #38625
  • Correct implementation of custom AuthenticationStateProvider in server-side Blazor #38624
  • [Feature Request] - Add Support for rendering Render Fragment / Component into string #38622
  • Use Json Source Generators With Minimum APIs #38621
  • Unable to pack .NET 6 blazorserver as dotnet tool #38620
  • Blazor issue with new DotNetStreamReference in net6 #38618
  • Authentication failure - return a message to the user? #38617
  • Razor css isolation {APP ASSEMBLY}.styles.css 404 in Production mode #38616
  • {action} as parameter in GET route does not work - 404 #38615
  • Component E2E test failure in Ubuntu #38613

Closed

  • Blazor server side prefix url #38584
  • IIS tests are timing out #37915
    7.0-preview1
  • Can't launch Kestrel if the startup takes 'long' time in Visual Studio 2022 .NET 6 #38544
  • [Blazor] Availability of User in Startup #35611
  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38583
    Discussions
  • Razor Class Library - Static Web Assets that are being built during the pack process don't get added in Net6.0 #38596
  • Misleading comment about UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction #38572
    7.0-preview1
  • [ANCM] Add support for equivalent of disallowRotationOnConfigChange #37463
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor app fails to run with JS error "Failed to invoke 'StartCircuit' due to an error on the server" after upgrading from .NET5 to .NET6 #38599
  • Authorization failure with resource - lack of documentation/warning/implementation #33958
    7.0-preview1
  • Versioning Api endpoints with webapi .net 6 and swagger error #37993
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Memory leak in RazorView and ViewBuffer bundle #38550
  • Escaping the At symbol (@) fails if certain header metadata is included #15045
    Backlog
  • using AssemblyInfo.cs for "ASP.NET Core Web App" : Razor ". Views" dll gets version "0.0.0.0" #37795
    Discussions

PullRequests

Merged

  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Split IISFunctionals startup/shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction key comparison #38623
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky test RendersAuthorizingUntilAuthorizationCompletedAsync #38619
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `3e0e32b` #38567
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Visual Studio 2022 Release installation #38592
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Remove request-only headers from enumerator #38610
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use window.document for React-Native #38598
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x
  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
